mapper.select:
select
from new_house
and house_name like concat(concat('%',#{houseName}),'%')
and house_property like concat(concat('%',#{houseProperty}),'%')
and house_characteristic like concat(concat('%',#{houseCharacteristic}),'%')
and house_total_price like concat(concat('%',#{houseTotalPrice}),'%')
and house_price like concat(concat('%',#{housePrice}),'%')
and house_area like concat(concat('%',#{houseArea}),'%')
and house_position like concat(concat('%',#{housePosition}),'%')
and house_state like concat(concat('%',#{houseState}),'%')
and house_number like concat(concat('%',#{houseNumber}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into new_house (house_name, house_position, house_address, house_property, house_area, house_characteristic, house_price, house_total_price, house_developer, house_certificate, house_certificate_time, house_state, house_img, house_ishide, house_number, type_id, chara_id, good_id, house_users_no) values (#{houseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housePosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseCharacteristic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{houseTotalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{houseDeveloper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCertificateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{houseState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseIshide,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{charaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseUsersNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
